resources.string: It doesn\'t look like Stefan Kung and Edward Theuns are very happy that the two Sunweb riders behind haven\'t joined them yet. They\'re riding on but they know a two-man break probably isn\'t going to go the distance today and need more allies. Cees Bol and Casper Pedersen aren\'t trying to bridge across anymore, they\'ve pretty much sat up and are awaiting for the Bora-led peloton to sweep them up. Peter Sagan is talking tactics with his team.
